Privacy Policy

How We Protect Your Information

Last updated: 19 December 2025

üîí

Overview

This Privacy Policy explains how personal information is collected and handled when you visit syedbokhari.com.au and when you contact Syed Bokhari regarding behaviour support enquiries. This site is intended for professional enquiries and general contact.

‚úì No sensitive data via contact form ‚úì Professional enquiries only ‚úì Secure third-party form processing
üìã

What Information May Be Collected

If you contact me via the website contact form, email, or phone, the information collected may include:

üë§

Personal Information

  • Your name
  • Your email address
  • Your phone number (if provided)
üí¨

Communication Details

  • The content of your message
  • Enquiry type and purpose
üîß

Technical Information

  • IP address and browser details
  • Standard internet logs
  • Website usage analytics
‚ö†Ô∏è

Sensitive Information Warning

Please do not include sensitive personal information in the website contact form. If you are an NDIS participant (or contacting on behalf of one), sensitive details should be shared only through appropriate, secure channels after initial contact and confirmation of arrangements.

Examples of information NOT to include:

‚ùå Detailed medical history
‚ùå NDIS plan numbers
‚ùå Detailed behavioural incidents
‚ùå Financial information
üìß

Third-Party Processing

Formspree Secure Processor

The contact form on this website is processed by Formspree. When you submit a message, your data is transmitted securely to deliver it to my professional inbox. By using the form, you acknowledge their processing of your data in accordance with their privacy standards.

üîê

Storage and Security

I take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access. Information is stored securely using encrypted professional email and document management systems.

Data Retention & Cleanup:

Enquiry data is periodically reviewed. If an enquiry does not result in a formal Service Agreement, personal details are typically de-identified or securely destroyed within 12 months, unless required for legal or insurance record-keeping.

‚úÖ Encrypted Communication
‚úÖ Regular Data Review
‚úÖ Limited Access Protocols
üìù

Access and Correction

You may request access to personal information I hold about you at any time. If you believe the information is inaccurate or out of date, please contact me to request a correction.

Privacy Enquiries

If you have questions about how your privacy is managed, please reach out directly:

syed@syedbokhari.com.au
